ExecutiveSummary.one_line: Secure prompt management protocol with versioning, access controls, redaction, and audits.

bullets.item: Immutable versioning and change control workflow.

SynthesizedConclusion.KeyFinding: Versioned prompt registry with signed releases.
Secret redaction and RBAC with least privilege.
SynthesizedConclusion.RiskAssessment: Audit logs with anomaly alerts and rollback.
